org.hypergraphdb.event

Class HGAtomRefusedException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • org.hypergraphdb.HGException
            • org.hypergraphdb.event.HGAtomRefusedException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class HGAtomRefusedException
extends HGException

    This exception is thrown when an attempt to add a new atom to a HyperGraph instance failed. Generally, this exception is thrown as a response to the HGAtomProposeEvent and can be caught by an application that expects it to occur. Listener of the can be defined to implement various database integrity constraints or even application-level constraints that are otherwise cumbersome to enforce.

    See Also:
